name: Thor, Lord of the Aesir
text:
1 Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; until the end of this turn, that target has its effects negated, and you can use any of its effects as this card's effect. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because this face-up card on the field was destroyed and sent to there this turn: You can Special Summon this card. If Summoned this way: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.
